name: Senior Next
description: If you are ready to find love again and fill your golden years with the joy and romance you deserve, we are here to make your wishes come true. Senior Next is a dating app specially designed for golden-agers who want to make every day count and know that their second youth can be much better than the first one.  Some say that age is nothing but a number, but we know that with age, you gain maturity, experience, and a complete understanding of what really matters in life. That is why senior romances are more lasting and fulfilling than the passing infatuations of youth. With our easy-to-use app, you can meet all kinds of interesting seniors who are ready to experience the romance of their lifetime. You can make new friends, enrich your social life, and find true love among people who truly understand you  all in a pleasant and intimate environment that lets romance flourish unbounded. Our app has already helped thousands of golden-agers rediscover the joys of dating and find their ideal companions. It is completely free to use and exists for one purpose only  to make it easy for you to meet that special someone who makes you laugh, gives you support, and brings sunshine into your days. So waste no time, be bold, and open up the most exciting chapter of your life!  How Senior Next works:  1) Create an account by logging in with your Facebook account or your email address 2) Add a little something about yourself so people can get to know you better 3) Start liking people - once they like you back, you can chat instantly and for free  The app is completely free to use, but you can enhance your experience by upgrading to a premium membership plan:  - no more ads - unlimited likes so youll get more matches - more Superlikes per day - undo likes or mis-swipes - ability to go private  and more...  Premium membership pricing:  1 month for $29.99 12 months for $83.99 (best option!)  Premium membership information:  - Payment will be charged to your card at confirmation of purchase. - Premium subscription will auto-renew, unless you turn off that option at least 24 hours before the end of the current Premium membership period. - Subscription will be charged and renewed within 24 hours prior to the end of the current Premium membership period. - You can turn off auto-renewal at any time. - No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period.  Senior Next Terms of Use: https://www.seniornext.com/pages/terms.html Senior Next Privacy policy: https://www.seniornext.com/pages/privacy.html  You have to be at least 18 years old to use Senior Next app.
